comments.text:
Created attachment 529484
testcase

In the testcase, select the first four quoted lines (Hi Joe, empty line, foo, and empty line) and end your selection in the dead space in front of 1) foo. Press delete/backspace. The entire stylesheet for the page is suddenly put into the content, right where you deleted the text.
comments.raw_text: In the testcase, select the first four quoted lines (Hi Joe, empty line, foo, and empty line) and end your selection in the dead space in front of 1) foo. Press delete/backspace. The entire stylesheet for the page is suddenly put into the content, right where you deleted the text.
